mapper.select: select drugId, drugName, jj, xz, spmc, jx, syz, yfyl, zycf, zysx, etyy, gg, yfjbrqfnyy, manu, zc, hypy, tymc, pzwh, zxbz, ywxhzy, yxq, blfy, lryy, price from drugInfo where drugId = #{drugid}
mapper.insert: insert into drugInfo(drugName, jj, xz, spmc, jx, syz, yfyl, zycf, zysx, etyy, gg, yfjbrqfnyy, manu, zc, hypy, tymc, pzwh, zxbz, ywxhzy, yxq, blfy, lryy, price) values (#{drugname}, #{jj}, #{xz}, #{spmc}, #{jx}, #{syz}, #{yfyl}, #{zycf}, #{zysx}, #{etyy}, #{gg}, #{yfjbrqfnyy}, #{manu}, #{zc}, #{hypy}, #{tymc}, #{pzwh}, #{zxbz}, #{ywxhzy}, #{yxq}, #{blfy}, #{lryy}, #{price})

insert into drugInfo(drugName, jj, xz, spmc, jx, syz, yfyl, zycf, zysx, etyy, gg, yfjbrqfnyy, manu, zc, hypy, tymc, pzwh, zxbz, ywxhzy, yxq, blfy, lryy, price) values
(#{entity.drugname}, #{entity.jj}, #{entity.xz}, #{entity.spmc}, #{entity.jx}, #{entity.syz}, #{entity.yfyl}, #{entity.zycf}, #{entity.zysx}, #{entity.etyy}, #{entity.gg}, #{entity.yfjbrqfnyy}, #{entity.manu}, #{entity.zc}, #{entity.hypy}, #{entity.tymc}, #{entity.pzwh}, #{entity.zxbz}, #{entity.ywxhzy}, #{entity.yxq}, #{entity.blfy}, #{entity.lryy}, #{entity.price})

insert into drugInfo(drugName, jj, xz, spmc, jx, syz, yfyl, zycf, zysx, etyy, gg, yfjbrqfnyy, manu, zc, hypy, tymc, pzwh, zxbz, ywxhzy, yxq, blfy, lryy, price) values
(#{entity.drugname}, #{entity.jj}, #{entity.xz}, #{entity.spmc}, #{entity.jx}, #{entity.syz}, #{entity.yfyl}, #{entity.zycf}, #{entity.zysx}, #{entity.etyy}, #{entity.gg}, #{entity.yfjbrqfnyy}, #{entity.manu}, #{entity.zc}, #{entity.hypy}, #{entity.tymc}, #{entity.pzwh}, #{entity.zxbz}, #{entity.ywxhzy}, #{entity.yxq}, #{entity.blfy}, #{entity.lryy}, #{entity.price})
on duplicate key update drugName = values(drugName), jj = values(jj), xz = values(xz), spmc = values(spmc), jx = values(jx), syz = values(syz), yfyl = values(yfyl), zycf = values(zycf), zysx = values(zysx), etyy = values(etyy), gg = values(gg), yfjbrqfnyy = values(yfjbrqfnyy), manu = values(manu), zc = values(zc), hypy = values(hypy), tymc = values(tymc), pzwh = values(pzwh), zxbz = values(zxbz), ywxhzy = values(ywxhzy), yxq = values(yxq), blfy = values(blfy), lryy = values(lryy), price = values(price)
mapper.update:
update drugInfo
drugName = #{drugname},
jj = #{jj},
xz = #{xz},
spmc = #{spmc},
jx = #{jx},
syz = #{syz},
yfyl = #{yfyl},
zycf = #{zycf},
zysx = #{zysx},
etyy = #{etyy},
gg = #{gg},
yfjbrqfnyy = #{yfjbrqfnyy},
manu = #{manu},
zc = #{zc},
hypy = #{hypy},
tymc = #{tymc},
pzwh = #{pzwh},
zxbz = #{zxbz},
ywxhzy = #{ywxhzy},
yxq = #{yxq},
blfy = #{blfy},
lryy = #{lryy},
price = #{price},
where drugId = #{drugid}
